meanings.definition: Having an excess amount of body fat.
meanings.sent1: The doctor said I was overfat and needed to exercise more.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious about being overfat compared to her friends.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat looked overfat after eating too many treats.
meanings.sent4: The balloon was so overfat that it popped with a loud bang.
meanings.sent5: The overfat snowman melted quickly in the warm sun.

meanings.definition: To have a higher percentage of body fat than is considered healthy.
meanings.sent1: I need to stop eating junk food to avoid overfatting.
meanings.sent2: He overfatted after indulging in too many desserts over the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel seemed to overfat on acorns before hibernation.
meanings.sent4: Her backpack overfatted with books and made her shoulders ache.
meanings.sent5: The river began to overfat its banks after heavy rainfall.
